income_messages:
From: d******h@mail.ee
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-03-14 08:07:30
SUBJECT:   Good Day
  Good Day
 How are you doing and how is your business life, hope all is well? It is my pleasure to write this letter to you to solicit for your mutual assistance in this business.
 Though I know in a situation like this it will make any one apprehensive and worried, but I am assuring you that all is under control.
I decided to contact you due to the urgency of this transaction.
My name is  Andrew P. Swigergrey; an Engineer with Exxon Mobil in London http:/ /www.exxonmobil.co.uk). 
I seek for your business partnership to assist me in Oil business 
transactions.
 I appreciate the fact that we have no prior knowledge or existing 
 business relationship, but due to the urgency of this transaction, I 
 decided to make contact with you in a good faith.
 I will explain to you in details the nature of the business upon your indication of interest for details on the transaction. E-Mail:
exxon3mobil@mail.ee
Regards
ANDREW P. SWIGERGREY
(International Gas Marketing)
ExxonMobil House
Ermyn Way
Leatherhead
Surrey, KT22 8UX.   
From: d******h@mail.ee
To: we56023@m**************m
Time: 2023-03-15 04:12:04
SUBJECT: Re:   Good Day
ExxonMobil House 
Ermyn Way 
Leatherhead 
Surrey, KT22 8UX. 
I am Mr. Dennis Lynch, representing the operation and corporate affairs in contract related matters of Exxon Mobil in London ( http://www.exxonmobil.com).  Exxon Mobil is one of the World Largest oil producing and Management Company with over 1.2 Trillion pounds Capital contract Investment. (http://www.exxonmobil.com%29.%20/) 
As a Senior Vice President and Principal Financial Officer of Exxon Mobil that handle contract related matters. Every year we award contract and build refineries. 
 The Main Transaction Why I Contacted You 
Note:  I have buyer's that will need monthly supply of two million barrels of crude oil for one year, any buyer will come through you as a register Contractor. 
This is how the business deal goes for example here in terminal we load crude oil or give it out to our register contractor at the rate of one dollar per barrel and the buyer will receive a barrel at the rate of five to ten dollar depend on the negotiation or agreement with the buyer. The buyer will pay you the money and you will deduct the one-dollar times how many barrels the buyer needs and remit it to Exxon Mobil for the loading of the crude oil. 
I will be here to supervise the loading and will forward the tracking to you to track when it will be delivering to your customer {buyer}. I will forward all the contact of any buyer to you. We as the staff of Exxon Mobil is not permitted to trade, this is why I need to work with you even when I retire business will still go on. 
Exxon Mobil doesn't pay her staff pension when retire, this is why I need to secure myself a business. 
All you need to do is to register yourself a company name in your Country so that you can liaise {partner} with ExxonMobil as one of the Contractors. As a register contractor or partnership with ExxonMobil Broker there are a lot to benefit. 
 BENIFIT AS A REGISTER CONTRACTOR. 
1}Contract execution in your Country {Building of refinery if we can get a good site for it} 
2}Sub-dealer when you partner with us. 
3}Receive funds for the Contract and from Buyers} 
Most importantly, you will be required to fill your data stated below to enable me arrange legal documents that will proof you as a sole contractor with EXXON MOBIL: 
(1). Stand as the beneficiary / contractor with Exxon Mobil to receive the funds as I will present you before the firm with legal documents. 
(2). Receive the funds into a business/personal bank account in your country. 
(3). At the completion of this transaction, the sharing rates shall be 50% for me, 50% for you. 
(4) Full Names; 
(5) Contact Address: 
(6) Direct Telephone No: 
(7) Occupation: 
(8) Age and Marital Status: 
(9) Means of Identification: 
This information is require so that I can apply for the letter of Acceptance if you are interested. Do you have a register business name in your Country that we can use it to partner with ExxonMobil 
Note: Get back to me as soon as possible For more details about the funds and the business. Please I am not asking you for a financial assistance 
Best Regards,  Dennis Lynch, 
Senior Vice President and Principal Financial Officer 
(International Gas Marketing) 
ExxonMobil House 
. 
Ermyn Way 
Leatherhead 
Surrey, KT22 8UX.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT:   Good Day
conversations.body:
Good Day
 How are you doing and how is your business life, hope all is well? It is my pleasure to write this letter to you to solicit for your mutual assistance in this business.
 Though I know in a situation like this it will make any one apprehensive and worried, but I am assuring you that all is under control.
I decided to contact you due to the urgency of this transaction.
My name is  Andrew P. Swigergrey; an Engineer with Exxon Mobil in London http:/ /www.exxonmobil.co.uk). 
I seek for your business partnership to assist me in Oil business 
transactions.
 I appreciate the fact that we have no prior knowledge or existing 
 business relationship, but due to the urgency of this transaction, I 
 decided to make contact with you in a good faith.
 I will explain to you in details the nature of the business upon your indication of interest for details on the transaction. E-Mail:
exxon3mobil@mail.ee
Regards
ANDREW P. SWIGERGREY
(International Gas Marketing)
ExxonMobil House
Ermyn Way
Leatherhead
Surrey, KT22 8UX.

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re:   Good Day
conversations.body:
Hi, 
I'm interested in your proposal, but I think we need to explore this a bit further before I commit.
 Kind Regards,
Robert Milliken
___________________________________
Robert Milliken,
Senior Financial Manager,
vodafone.co.uk/business
1 Kingdom St, London,
Greater London

conversations.subject: SUBJECT: Re:   Good Day
conversations.body:
ExxonMobil House 
Ermyn Way 
Leatherhead 
Surrey, KT22 8UX. 
I am Mr. Dennis Lynch, representing the operation and corporate affairs in contract related matters of Exxon Mobil in London ( http://www.exxonmobil.com).  Exxon Mobil is one of the World Largest oil producing and Management Company with over 1.2 Trillion pounds Capital contract Investment. (http://www.exxonmobil.com%29.%20/) 
As a Senior Vice President and Principal Financial Officer of Exxon Mobil that handle contract related matters. Every year we award contract and build refineries. 
 The Main Transaction Why I Contacted You 
Note:  I have buyer's that will need monthly supply of two million barrels of crude oil for one year, any buyer will come through you as a register Contractor. 
This is how the business deal goes for example here in terminal we load crude oil or give it out to our register contractor at the rate of one dollar per barrel and the buyer will receive a barrel at the rate of five to ten dollar depend on the negotiation or agreement with the buyer. The buyer will pay you the money and you will deduct the one-dollar times how many barrels the buyer needs and remit it to Exxon Mobil for the loading of the crude oil. 
I will be here to supervise the loading and will forward the tracking to you to track when it will be delivering to your customer {buyer}. I will forward all the contact of any buyer to you. We as the staff of Exxon Mobil is not permitted to trade, this is why I need to work with you even when I retire business will still go on. 
Exxon Mobil doesn't pay her staff pension when retire, this is why I need to secure myself a business. 
All you need to do is to register yourself a company name in your Country so that you can liaise {partner} with ExxonMobil as one of the Contractors. As a register contractor or partnership with ExxonMobil Broker there are a lot to benefit. 
 BENIFIT AS A REGISTER CONTRACTOR. 
1}Contract execution in your Country {Building of refinery if we can get a good site for it} 
2}Sub-dealer when you partner with us. 
3}Receive funds for the Contract and from Buyers} 
Most importantly, you will be required to fill your data stated below to enable me arrange legal documents that will proof you as a sole contractor with EXXON MOBIL: 
(1). Stand as the beneficiary / contractor with Exxon Mobil to receive the funds as I will present you before the firm with legal documents. 
(2). Receive the funds into a business/personal bank account in your country. 
(3). At the completion of this transaction, the sharing rates shall be 50% for me, 50% for you. 
(4) Full Names; 
(5) Contact Address: 
(6) Direct Telephone No: 
(7) Occupation: 
(8) Age and Marital Status: 
(9) Means of Identification: 
This information is require so that I can apply for the letter of Acceptance if you are interested. Do you have a register business name in your Country that we can use it to partner with ExxonMobil 
Note: Get back to me as soon as possible For more details about the funds and the business. Please I am not asking you for a financial assistance 
Best Regards,  Dennis Lynch, 
Senior Vice President and Principal Financial Officer 
(International Gas Marketing) 
ExxonMobil House 
. 
Ermyn Way 
Leatherhead 
Surrey, KT22 8UX.

 Attn: Robert Milliken 
Thanks once again for the response. The next step is you to furnish me with your business name, your full name and address so that I can apply for acceptance letter. If it is approved. Your Company name will liaise with ExxonMobil and the certificate of incorporation will be issue to as one of the contractor. Wait for your response. Best Regards, Dennis Lynch, Senior Vice President and Principal Financial Officer (International Gas Marketing) ExxonMobil House Ermyn Way Leatherhead Surrey, KT22 8UX.
